name: Rogue Trials
description:
This Unreal Engine TPP roguelike game was developed as part of my end of degree thesis titled Procedural videogame content generation guided by the player's skill and aims to show an implementation of procedural content generation, in the form of the game's rooms and play experience, based on the skill that the user shows whilst playing it. There is no tricking the system: a player who beats the game in the hardest difficulty will always have more score than one who doesn't!

Challenge yourself or your friends into getting the highest score while making your way through the different levels of the game!

I hope you enjoy your time playing Rogue Trials :D
